title: 373: How To Raise Your Vibration + Create Your Own Reality with Aaron Doughty
itunes:title: 373: How To Raise Your Vibration + Create Your Own Reality with Aaron Daughty
description:
I loved this conversation with my friend and Youtuber extraordinaire Aaron about his journey of discovering his dharma. I found so many similarities between his story and the 5 Stages of Dharma Discovery from my book Discover Your Dharma and it is truly so inspiring to hear how he went from idea to action, all by being aligned with his intuition. You’ll feel like our 3rd friend in the room in this convo!

Join my Free Discover Your Soul Purpose Masterclass at www.iamsahararose.com/masterclass

Get your Qualia Mind from Neurohacker at https://neurohacker.com/shop/qualia-mind?rfsn=5765711.0d934c and use code SAHARA for 15% off your order.

Enjoy your own delicious Organifi Gold and their other incredible products at organifi.com/sahara for 20% off

Get your EMF Protection phone case at www.safesleevecases.com with coupon code SAHARA for 10% off

Intro + Outro Music: Silent Ganges by Maneesh de Moor

Connect with me for daily Ayurvedic and modern spiritual wisdom at:
Instagram.com/iamsahararose
Facebook.com/iamsahararose
Twitter.com/iamsahararose

Order My Books Eat Feel Fresh + Idiot's Guide to Ayurveda: www.iamsahararose.com/books
